**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 1.1 **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). --- You pinch crucial points of your target's nervous system, impeding its ability to function. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) the creature, with the following success and critical success effects instead of the usual effects. **Critical Success** The target falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) for 1 minute, though it remains standing and doesn't drop what it holds.
**Success** The target is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) until the end of its next turn.
